attributes.action: Make the England World Cup Squad apologise to everyone in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
Englands 2014 World Cup performance was nothing short of a disaster.

After months of training and prepartion the performance given was far short of what we came to expect from the best players this country has to offer.

There can be no doubt we were in one of the toughest groups in the competition, but not to even make it out of the group stages in unforgivable.

Such is the scale of the nations disappointment, the entire England squad should make:

A) Televised apologie

or

B) A door to door tour apologising in person to every England fan.

An opt out policy would be in place to allow those who thought the performance was acceptable.
